题目提供了两组数据:

```
e = 65537
n = 
c = 

e = 65537
n = 
c = 
```

其中N都为大数，直接分解不现实，先利用两个N求解出最大公约数P，再求得Q，最后计算M。

```python
from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes
import gmpy2

n1 = 
n2 = 

p = gmpy2.gcd(n1, n2)
q = n1 // p

print(p)
print(q)

#
#
```

```python
# n = p*q
import gmpy2
from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes

# 计算d
def cal_d(p, q, e):
    phi = (p-1)*(q-1)
    return gmpy2.invert(e, phi)

# 计算明文m
def cal_m(c, d, n):
    return pow(c, d, n)

# 计算密文c
def cal_c(m, e, n):
    return pow(m, e, n)


p = 
q = 
e = 65537
c = 

d = cal_d(p, q, e)
m = cal_m(c, d, p*q)
print(long_to_bytes(m))

#flag{m0_bv_hv_sv}
```
